meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sara Heard Michelle Franklin Tim Kresowik Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6128.

td.p: Sara Heard, a housewife from Brooklyn, New York
Michelle Franklin, a localization editor from San Diego, California
Tim Kresowik, a urology resident from Iowa City, Iowa (whose 2-day cash winnings total $42,201)

tr.td: THINKING GREEN
MGM WOULD HAVE CHANGED YOUR NAME
THAT'S MY DRINK
"C" SERPENTS
VIRGIN BERTHS
PLAYING FOOTBALL FOR VOCABULARY

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'the Christmas tree

Sara
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: It\'s the only time three men have shared the Nobel Peace Prize. Yasir Arafat was one of the winners. The other two were prime ministers of Israel.)
...
(Alex: [To Tim] No, Begin won in another year with Anwar Sadat.)
MichelleWho Netanyahu and ??
$5,000
SaraWho are Rabin and Shamir?
$6,801
TimWho are Begin + Rabin?
$12,001
Shimon Peres & Yitzhak Rabin')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'The 2 Middle East prime ministers of the same country who shared the 1994 Nobel Peace Prize with another leader')

tr.td: NOBEL PEACE PRIZE WINNERS
The 2 Middle East prime ministers of the same country who shared the 1994 Nobel Peace Prize with another leader
Tim
Michelle
Sara
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $7,999
Tim
Michelle
Sara

23 R,
1 W
(including 1 DD)

14 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W
(including 1 DD)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
